usage: Facilitates working with HTML content.
Handles reading, writing, and verification of XML files.
Manages YAML objects within Rmd files.
Processes Markdown documents, extracts YAML objects, and calls Pandoc functions.
Provides a simple HTTP server.
Accesses RStudio session details, manages files and projects, and controls RStudio IDE behavior (Viewer).
Offers tools for file system operations.
Provides functions for string manipulation.
Displays methods for a generic function and checks available methods for a specific function.
Converts datestamps to date-time objects (in extract_results.R).
Introduces the %>% operator for piping.
Facilitates working with HTTP requests.
Transfers data with URLs, enabling file inclusion in HTTP requests.
Generates file name hashes using the SHA-1 algorithm (in extract_results.R) to handle sensitive information.
Creates HTML and compiles dynamic documents written in R Markdown with embedded R code.
Hides user passwords (in API).
Securely stores and retrieves sensitive authentication data.
Manipulates ZIP archives.
Formats grading tables.
Decodes HTML entities.
